We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brand / Account Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikoyi, Lagos (Hybrid)
Employment Type: Full-time
Working Hours: Monday - Thursday: 10:00 AM &ndash; 5:00 PM (Onsite); Friday: Work From Home

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Brand / Account Manager to oversee brand initiatives, manage client accounts, and ensure the successful execution of marketing and advertising projects.
	The ideal candidate will have strong strategic thinking, excellent communication skills, and hands-on experience in brand management within the advertising or digital marketing industry.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective brand strategies that align with business goals.
	Conduct market research to gather insights on consumer behavior, industry trends, and competitor activities.
	Manage client accounts, ensuring clear communication, timely delivery, and high-quality execution of all projects.
	Coordinate cross-functional teams (design, marketing, content, production) to deliver brand and advertising campaigns.
	Prepare and present brand strategies, proposals, and performance reports to clients and internal teams.
	Monitor brand consistency across marketing materials and communication channels.
	Use marketing tools and software to analyze campaign performance and generate insights.
	Build and maintain strong client relationships, ensuring client satisfaction and repeat business.
	Support the development of creative briefs, advertising materials, and promotional content.
	Ensure all projects are delivered within timeline, scope, and budget.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
	3 - 5 years of experience in brand management, account management, or marketing roles.
	Strong understanding of branding, marketing principles, and advertising strategies.
	Ability to analyze consumer data and market trends to inform brand decisions.
	Excellent project management and coordination skills.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, and presentation abilities.
	Proficiency with marketing tools/software such as CRM tools, analytics platforms, or project management tools.
	Ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team.
	Experience in the advertising or digital marketing industry is an added advantage.


Remuneration


	Salary Range:&nbsp;N300,000 &ndash; N450,000 / Month (based on experience).
	Benefits: HMO, Pension.

Brand / Account Manager Job at LaborHack




        
    

        
        LaborHack connects businesses and homeowners with skilled and certified workers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brand / Account Manager
Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos (Hybrid)
Employment Type: Full-time
Working Hours: Monday - Thursday: 10:00 AM – 5:00 PM (Onsite); Friday: Work From Home

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Brand / Account Manager to oversee brand initiatives, manage client accounts, and ensure the successful execution of marketing and advertising projects.
	The ideal candidate will have strong strategic thinking, excellent communication skills, and hands-on experience in brand management within the advertising or digital marketing industry.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective brand strategies that align with business goals.
	Conduct market research to gather insights on consumer behavior, industry trends, and competitor activities.
	Manage client accounts, ensuring clear communication, timely delivery, and high-quality execution of all projects.
	Coordinate cross-functional teams (design, marketing, content, production) to deliver brand and advertising campaigns.
	Prepare and present brand strategies, proposals, and performance reports to clients and internal teams.
	Monitor brand consistency across marketing materials and communication channels.
	Use marketing tools and software to analyze campaign performance and generate insights.
	Build and maintain strong client relationships, ensuring client satisfaction and repeat business.
	Support the development of creative briefs, advertising materials, and promotional content.
	Ensure all projects are delivered within timeline, scope, and budget.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
	3 - 5 years of experience in brand management, account management, or marketing roles.
	Strong understanding of branding, marketing principles, and advertising strategies.
	Ability to analyze consumer data and market trends to inform brand decisions.
	Excellent project management and coordination skills.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, and presentation abilities.
	Proficiency with marketing tools/software such as CRM tools, analytics platforms, or project management tools.
	Ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team.
	Experience in the advertising or digital marketing industry is an added advantage.


Remuneration


	Salary Range: N300,000 – N450,000 / Month (based on experience).
	Benefits: HMO, Pension.

	The HSE Officer is responsible for developing, implementing, and monitoring Health, Safety &amp; Environmental policies, procedures, and guidelines to ensure compliance with national legislation and international best practices.

	Monitor compliance with safety laws, regulations, and company policies.

	Maintain accurate HSE documentation and prepare periodic reports.
	Ensure availability and proper use of PPE, fire safety systems, and emergency equipment.
	Coordinate with relevant stakeholders during safety drills, evacuation procedures, and regulatory inspections.
	Support the development of a positive safety culture and continuous improvement of safety performance.

Salary
N120,000 monthly.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Personal Assistant to the Head, Corporate Marketing Strategy",
  "description": "Brit Properties Nigeria Limited is a property development company incorporated in Nigeria by Companies and Allied Matters Act. Our primary business interests are land, infrastructure/property development, land survey, property marketing and estate agency. We strive to provide exceptional customer service while offering our clients the best property options. We are committed to making good property decision for both existing and potential clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant to the Head, Corporate Marketing Strategy
Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a smart, highly organized Personal Assistant to support the Head of Corporate Marketing Strategy.
	The ideal candidate should be detail-oriented, proactive, and able to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced marketing environment.
